dependencies.description:
Supports both client and server side of HTTP protocol. Supports both
client and server Web-Sockets out-of-the-box and avoids Callbacks.
Provides Web-server with middlewares and plugable routing.
dependencies.name: py-aiohttp

dependencies.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.
dependencies.name: py-matplotlib

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: A Python library to read/write Excel 2010 xlsx/xlsm files
dependencies.name: py-openpyxl

dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.
dependencies.name: py-pandas

dependencies.description:
These are public type stubs for pandas, following the convention of
providing stubs in a separate package, as specified in PEP 561. The
stubs cover the most typical use cases of pandas. In general, these
stubs are narrower than what is possibly allowed by pandas, but follow a
convention of suggesting best recommended practices for using pandas.
dependencies.name: py-pandas-stubs

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: An interactive, browser-based graphing library for Python
dependencies.name: py-plotly

dependencies.description: A set of python modules for machine learning and data mining.
dependencies.name: py-scikit-learn

dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-scipy

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).
dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions

dependencies.description: A tool for visualizing and tracking your machine learning experiments.
dependencies.name: py-wandb

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
An automatic evaluator for instruction-following language models. Human-
validated, high-quality, cheap, and fast.
dependent_to.name: py-alpaca-eval

dependent_to.description:
AlpacaFarm is a simulator that enables research and development on
learning from feedback at a fraction of the usual cost, promoting
accessible research on instruction following and alignment.
dependent_to.name: py-alpaca-farm

description:
The OpenAI Python library provides convenient access to the OpenAI API
from applications written in the Python language. It includes a pre-
defined set of classes for API resources that initialize themselves
dynamically from API responses which makes it compatible with a wide
range of versions of the OpenAI API.
name: py-openai

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: keeps track of hyperparameters, system metrics, and predictions
variants.name: wandb
